Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/include/drm/drm_os_linux.h

1/* $NetBSD: drm_os_linux.h,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:38 riastradh Exp $ */
2
3/**
4 * \file drm_os_linux.h
5 * OS abstraction macros.
6 */
7
8#include <linux/interrupt.h> /* For task queue support */
9#include <linux/delay.h>
10
11#ifndef readq
12static inline u64 readq(void __iomem *reg)
13{
14 return ((u64) readl(reg)) | (((u64) readl(reg + 4UL)) << 32);
15}
16
17static inline void writeq(u64 val, void __iomem *reg)
18{
19 writel(val & 0xffffffff, reg);
20 writel(val >> 32, reg + 0x4UL);
21}
22#endif
23
24/** Current process ID */
25#define DRM_CURRENTPID task_pid_nr(current)
26#define DRM_UDELAY(d) udelay(d)
27/** Read a byte from a MMIO region */
28#define DRM_READ8(map, offset) readb(((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
29/** Read a word from a MMIO region */
30#define DRM_READ16(map, offset) readw(((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
31/** Read a dword from a MMIO region */
32#define DRM_READ32(map, offset) readl(((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
33/** Write a byte into a MMIO region */
34#define DRM_WRITE8(map, offset, val) writeb(val, ((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
35/** Write a word into a MMIO region */
36#define DRM_WRITE16(map, offset, val) writew(val, ((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
37/** Write a dword into a MMIO region */
38#define DRM_WRITE32(map, offset, val) writel(val, ((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
39
40/** Read a qword from a MMIO region - be careful using these unless you really understand them */
41#define DRM_READ64(map, offset) readq(((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
42/** Write a qword into a MMIO region */
43#define DRM_WRITE64(map, offset, val) writeq(val, ((void __iomem *)(map)->handle) + (offset))
44
45#define DRM_WAIT_ON( ret, queue, timeout, condition ) \
46do { \
47 DECLARE_WAITQUEUE(entry, current); \
48 unsigned long end = jiffies + (timeout); \
49 add_wait_queue(&(queue), &entry); \
50 \
51 for (;;) { \
52 __set_current_state(TASK_INTERRUPTIBLE); \
53 if (condition) \
54 break; \
55 if (time_after_eq(jiffies, end)) { \
56 ret = -EBUSY; \
57 break; \
58 } \
59 schedule_timeout((HZ/100 > 1) ? HZ/100 : 1); \
60 if (signal_pending(current)) { \
61 ret = -EINTR; \
62 break; \
63 } \
64 } \
65 __set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING); \
66 remove_wait_queue(&(queue), &entry); \
67} while (0)
68
